itunes:title: Hosea Week 2 with Jackie Hill Perry
title: Hosea Week 2 with Jackie Hill Perry
description:
It’s already the final week in Hosea, and Raechel and Amanda sit down with writer, poet, bible teacher, and hip-hop artist, Jackie Hill Perry. While reading the second half of this minor prophet, we witness God’s relentless faithfulness to a rebellious nation and learn how His holiness is worthy of our celebration. Together, may we learn from the story of Israel and always remember to turn back to the Lord our God. 

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth Hosea reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Hosea collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/hosea-week-2-with-jackie-hill-perry
